caption.p: Fluorescence images of untreated E. coli ( a) and the cells treated with M41–Z ( b) as the negative control, free Cin ( c) and M41–Cin–Z ( d) after 5 h of incubation. The study was performed using a two-color fluorescent LIVE/DEAD ® BacLight™ assay used to visualize viable (green) and dead (red) bacteria. Red-stained bacteria are not visible when dead cells do not remain intact after treatment.
